title: Authorizes the Bay Shore union free school district to transfer surplus monies from reserve funds to the general fund for purposes of reducing real property taxes
summary: Authorizes the Bay Shore union free school district to transfer surplus monies from its reserve funds to the general fund for the purposes of reducing real property taxes in support of such school district.
actClause: AN ACT to authorize the Bay Shore union free school district to transfer certain monies from reserve funds to the general fund for the purpose of real property tax reduction
